content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace Smelting Setup at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
• Stone Furnace at position (41.0, -82.0) that smelts ores.
• Burner Inserter at position (41.5, -83.5) facing UP, transferring output from the furnace.
• Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -84.5) receiving smelted items.
• Wooden Chest at position (42.5, -81.5) (present as an additional storage unit).

ERROR TIPS
• Missing or insufficient sub-ingredients – Repeated failures in crafting items (e.g., iron-gear-wheel, automation-science-pack, electronic-circuit, lab) are due to missing intermediate products like iron-plate, copper-plate, or copper-cable. Ensure that the required smelting or crafting setup is complete and ingredients are adequately supplied before initiating complex recipes.
• Unresearched technology – Errors such as failing to craft assembling-machine-1 indicate that the necessary technology (automation) has not been unlocked. Verify technology prerequisites and conduct research before attempting related crafts.
• Inventory and placement mismatches – Errors including failed lab placement ("No lab in inventory") and insertion errors (e.g., "No copper-plate to insert from your inventory") require confirming that the correct items are available and that target locations are ready for insertion. Double-check inventory and validate the readiness and existence of entities prior to placement or insert_item operations.
